title: Welcome Page
sitename: Welcome Page : Oregon Board of Naturopathic Medicine
cleaned_text: An official website of the State of Oregon Learn How you know » (how to identify a Oregon.gov website) An official website of the State of Oregon » You are here: The mission of the Oregon Board of Naturopathic Medicine is to regulate, through the Oregon Revised Statutes and Administrative Rules, the practices of naturopathic medicine in order to ensure protection of the public. We promote excellence in the practice of naturopathic medicine by assuring quality education, regulating naturopathic practices, and fostering ongoing public outreach. In this manner, the Board cultivates public trust and safety by ensuring the State of Oregon is served by naturopathic professionals providing the highest standards of care. A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States. A lock icon ( ) or https:// means you've safely connected to the .gov website.
